network.server

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.server.RequestHandler

  • public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class RequestHandler handles all request types. As of now the supported request types are ConnectionPacket, and ActionPacket.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestHandler(PlayerRepository playerRepo, LevelRepository levelRepo, com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Server server, World gWorld)
      Instantiates a new request handler.

      Handles ActionPacket types.

      void handleMapRequest(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection connection, java.lang.Object object)

      Handles move action by taking an Action with a Move type payload.

      • handleActionPacket

        public void handleActionPacket(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection connection,
                               java.lang.Object object)
        Handles ActionPacket types. Does so by sorting the type based on the ActionType enum.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection
        object - the object

      • handleConnectionRequest

        public void handleConnectionRequest(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection connection,
                                    java.lang.Object object)
        Handles connection request by adding entity(currently only player). To the world and sends a add packet to all clients.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection from Kryonet
        object - the object that is a instance of ConnectionRequest

      • handlePlayerRequest

        public void handlePlayerRequest(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection connection,
                                java.lang.Object object)
        Handle player request actions used to create a player without using the api. Used exclusively for testing.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection
        object - the object

      • handleMapRequest

        public void handleMapRequest(com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection connection,
                             java.lang.Object object)
        This method handles map requests. This is going to lose support soon, and is really only here for testing
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection received from Kryonet
        object - the object that is an instance of MapRequestPacket
